unit.utterance: Maumwi gabaw gaw jahkrai ma hkan dwi a lam nga re.
unit.utterance_translation: The title of the story is "the orphan and his grandmother."

unit.utterance: Moi kalang mi hta da ndai
unit.utterance_translation: Once upon a time, it's said, well,

unit.utterance: mare langai mi kaw she ndai jahkrai ma hkan dwi lahkawng nga ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: at one village, well, there were an orphan and his grandmother, it's said.

unit.utterance: shan dwi dai lasha wa re lasha re ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: This (orphan) was a male, it's said.

unit.utterance: rai na she shandwi gaw matsan ma grai matsan ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, they two were very poor.

unit.utterance: Re yang she masha ni na zawn ndai ahpraw nsam mung n-tsawm ai i.

unit.utterance: shan mung chyang chyang dai hku re na ahpraw nsam mung n-tsawm ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Their skins were also black and their appearance was not beautiful.

unit.utterance: e dan re hpaji mung n-chye ai re.
unit.utterance_translation: Thus, they also had no knowledge.

unit.utterance: dai lahkawng hkandwi lahkawng nga ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: There lived these two, it's said.

unit.utterance: shan dwi hpa mung nlu tsawm mung ntsawm yang she
unit.utterance_translation: The two had nothing and they were not beautiful and

unit.utterance_translation: no one wanted to make friends with (them) and

unit.utterance_translation: other children also teased this male child very much, it's said.

unit.utterance_translation: (They) had planned to go fishing, and when they were passing (by)

unit.utterance_translation: (He) was a child and because (he) wanted to play very much

unit.utterance_translation: (It) came back floating again.

unit.utterance_translation: He swam and

unit.utterance: bai sa la na she

unit.utterance_translation: (He) swam and took it and continued his trip and

unit.utterance_translation: "Who you want to meet with?" (they) said and

unit.utterance: ngai hkawhkam wa hte hkrum mayu ai nga tsun yang
unit.utterance_translation: "I want to meet the king," (he) said and

unit.utterance_translation: when (he) opened his pumpkin,

unit.utterance_translation: (it) shone very beautifully and

unit.utterance: dai hkawhkam wang ni gaw ndai grai mau mat na she
unit.utterance_translation: the people at the palace were very surprised and

unit.utterance: grai ma ra mat ai i
unit.utterance_translation: (they) also liked (it), OK?

unit.utterance: ma nang ndai gara kaw na la wa ai rai nga yang
unit.utterance_translation: "Child, where did you bring this from?" (they) said and

unit.utterance: dai hku la wa ai re nga kadai ma nkam ai i
unit.utterance_translation: "(I) brought (this) like this," (he) said and no one believed (the story), OK?

unit.utterance: gadai ma n-kam yang she
unit.utterance_translation: No one believed (it) and

unit.utterance: e rai sai nang gara hku na mi la wa ai raitim
unit.utterance_translation: "Well, OK, no matter how you brought (it),

unit.utterance: ndai gaw anhte ni hte she gying ai i
unit.utterance_translation: this is suitable to us."

unit.utterance: ma nang ma nang kade ram ra yang anhte ni nang hpe kade jaw na
unit.utterance_translation: "Child, we will give you (gifts) as much as you want."

unit.utterance: nang gade ra ai rai
unit.utterance_translation: "How much will you want?"

unit.utterance: tsun u nga jang she
unit.utterance_translation: "Tell [us]," (they) said and

unit.utterance: ma dai gaw kade ra ai re nga yang mung

unit.utterance: shi mung hpa ma n chye ai le.
unit.utterance_translation: he knew nothing.

unit.utterance: Shi gaw mare kaw sha hpa ma n chye ai nga wa ai re majaw gaw
unit.utterance_translation: Because he grew up in a village without knowing anything,

unit.utterance: hpa ra ai ngu tsun na ma shi hpa ma nchye ai
unit.utterance_translation: although they said "What do you want?" he knew nothing (he did not know how to answer it).

unit.utterance: raitim shi ra ai gaw grai law hkra ra ai hpe sha chye taw nga ai

unit.utterance_translation: "Look at him, his appearance and

unit.utterance_translation: "He is not willing to tell and
